TopicTitle: [Image Heavy] First Science-mode Mission to Duna! (With a bonus!)

Articles.Content:
So, as I began to reach the end of the tech tree in my Science mode save, I decided that it was time to go to Duna. I also decided to record this success as an album to share with everyone! So, without further ado, here it is!
